news.title: JK Cement's subsidiary invests AED 6 million to set up manufacturing facility in Ras Al Khaimah
news.para: JK DryChem Industries LLC, part of JK Cement, is channeling AED 6 million into a state-of-the-art manufacturing facility within Ras Al Khaimah Economic Zone. This plant will focus on producing premium construction chemicals and additives, with operations kicking off in January 2026.

news.title: Rajasthan: RIICO seeks applications for land use change in industrial areas
news.para: Rajasthan's RIICO is now accepting applications for industrial plot activity changes, aiming for practical land use. Businesses can convert plots online for a fee, with charges varying by new use. Industrial to commercial shifts incur double the industrial rate, while residential and mixed-use conversions have different rates. This aims to boost flexibility, revenue, and jobs.

news.title: Umiya Buildcon acquires 20,000 sq ft plot in Bengaluru’s CBD
news.para: Umiya Buildcon has secured a prime plot in Bengaluru's central business district for a new residential development.  Bengaluru's housing market is poised for continued growth, with strong demand in mid-income and luxury segments.

news.title: Bahrain lowers minimum real estate investment for golden residency to $345,000
news.para: Bahrain has slashed the investment threshold for its Golden Residency program to USD 345,000. This initiative is designed to energize the real estate sector and draw in a wave of foreign investors. The reduced requirement makes the program more appealing, yet it still retains its exclusivity.

news.title: Pune: PCMC likely to release red zone map around defence structures next week
news.para: Pimpri Chinchwad Municipal Corporation is set to release a red zone map within a week, clarifying construction prohibitions around defence depots. This map will provide much-needed clarity for nearly 4,000 property owners in areas like Talawade and Nigdi, following a tragic fire that highlighted illegal activities in restricted zones.

news.title: Mt K Kapital launches $450 million real estate fund for top cities
news.para: Mt K Kapital has announced the launch of its second real estate fund and raised USD 450 million. The fund will invest in emerging projects at the acquisition phase, primarily in key cities including Mumbai, NCR, Pune, and Bengaluru.

news.title: Over 50 vehicles seized for illegal sand lifting in Mahanadi ghat
news.para: Authorities in Kendrapada seized 50 trucks and three digging vehicles in a crackdown on illegal sand mining at Kilipal Ghat. The lessee was found to be operating far beyond sanctioned limits, lifting over ten times the authorized sand volume daily. This illegal extraction is estimated to cause a significant financial loss to the state exchequer.

news.title: Tata Realty & DBS Bank India sign ₹1,280 crore green loan facility
news.para: Tata Realty & Infrastructure has teamed up with DBS Bank India for a green loan of ₹1,280 crore. This infusion of green finance signals an important shift in India's real estate sector, enhancing funding opportunities for major commercial ventures while aligning with sustainable environmental goals.

news.title: Dehradun: Kathbangla residents oppose MDDA eviction, say rehabilitation flats ‘unsafe’
news.para: Residents of Kathbangla colony protested against eviction notices from MDDA, claiming rehabilitation flats are unsafe and too small. They questioned the legality of the drive, citing pre-2016 settlement guidelines and past tax collection. Protesters vowed not to vacate until full rehabilitation details are provided.

news.title: Sunaina Rakesh Roshan buys two commercial units worth ₹6.42 crore in Mumbai
news.para: Sunaina Rakesh Roshan has acquired two commercial units in the luxurious Vaidya West World One Aeropolis, located in Andheri East, Mumbai, with a total investment of ₹6.42 crore. These properties span over 2,400 sq ft and come with four dedicated car parking spaces.

news.title: Panchkula gets C&D waste policy; now pay & get debris cleared
news.para: Panchkula Municipal Corporation has launched a comprehensive plan to manage construction and demolition waste, including hiring an agency for collection and transportation to a designated site. The Rs 2.13 crore one-year contract will involve door-to-door services for residents and bulk generators, with strict penalties for non-compliance. The initiative aims to curb illegal dumping and explore future waste processing opportunities.

news.title: HDFC Capital & Hero Realty create ₹1,000 crore platform to invest in housing projects
news.para: HDFC Capital and Hero Realty are teaming up with a massive ₹1,000 crore fund to build new homes, focusing on major and secondary cities. Hero Realty already has a significant development pipeline, with five projects underway totaling 6.4 million sq ft and another eight million sq ft planned across five more projects.

news.title: Luxury home prices jump 40% since 2022 across top seven cities: Anarock
news.para: The luxury real estate market in India's seven premier cities has surged by 40% since 2022, outpacing other segments. The Delhi-NCR region has been a standout performer, witnessing a staggering 72% increase, primarily fueled by the influx of affluent buyers.

news.title: Bhubaneswar: BMC plans survey to regulate commercial activities in residential areas
news.para: Bhubaneswar Municipal Corporation is launching a survey to tackle the growing parking and commercial activity problem in residential areas.  Institutions and shops are contributing to lane congestion.  The BMC plans to identify solutions, potentially developing market clusters or parking lots to ease the chaos plaguing various city zones.

news.title: Ashiana Housing to invest over ₹750 crore to develop residential project in Gurugram
news.para: Ashiana Housing is set to invest over ₹750 crore in a new residential project in Gurugram. The project, Ashiana Aaroham, will feature 542 units across six towers. Phase 1, with 182 units, will be completed by July 2030. Funding comes from internal accruals, IFC, customer advances, and ICICI Pru NCD financing.

news.title: UK announces new tax on expensive homes from 2028
news.para: Starting April 2028, homeowners in Britain will need to prepare for a new annual tax aimed at residences valued over 2 million pounds. This fresh imposition will serve as an extra cost alongside regular local taxes. Properties worth between 2 million and 2.

news.title: Australia to cap high debt-to-income home loans from February to curb housing risks
news.para: Beginning in February, Australia's banking regulator is set to impose a cap on high debt-to-income home loans, a strategic effort to curb housing market volatility amid rising property prices and rapid credit expansion.

news.title: GRAP Stage-3 curbs revoked in Delhi-NCR amid slight improvement in air quality
news.para: Delhi-NCR is breathing a little easier these days as air quality shows improvement, prompting the lifting of Stage-3 restrictions mandated by the Graded Response Action Plan. Although the most severe pollution measures are now a thing of the past, Stage-1 and Stage-2 protocols remain in effect.

news.title: Gurugram: Ornamental Realtors faces FIR for not renewing licence
news.para: District town planner seeks FIR against Ornamental Realtors Pvt Ltd for alleged violations of its commercial colony license in Sector 61. The builder failed to meet statutory requirements, including timely renewal applications and fee deposits, and did not upload mandatory compliance documents. This action highlights the government's strict oversight of licensed colony projects.

news.title: China Vanke bonds slump as concerns mount over state support
news.para: China Vanke experienced a dramatic fall in its bonds on Wednesday, raising alarms about possible government assistance for the faltering property sector. Significant losses in the developer's yuan bonds caused trading to be halted.
